parts:
MESSAGE FROM: Master Planner
MESSAGE TO: Web Explorer

Web Explorer, please research potential travel routes, affordable activities, and estimated costs for a 7-day trip across India, including Delhi, Agra, Jaipur, Varanasi, Mumbai, and Goa. Focus on budget-friendly options to stay within the 10,000 INR budget. Provide a summary of possible itineraries and cost estimates for each city.

ADDITIONAL RESOURCE:
No additional resource

```yml
thoughts: >
    The Master Planner has assigned me the task of researching potential travel routes, affordable activities, and estimated costs for a 7-day trip across India, including Delhi, Agra, Jaipur, Varanasi, Mumbai, and Goa, within a 10,000 INR budget. I need to focus on budget-friendly options and provide a summary of possible itineraries and cost estimates for each city. To accomplish this, I will use the web_search tool to gather the necessary information.
name: web_search
params: >
    {"query": "budget travel India 7 days Delhi Agra Jaipur Varanasi Mumbai Goa itinerary cost"}
```

Here is your tool response:

1. 
Title: 47 Agra Packages From Mumbai - MakeMyTrip
Description:  6 Days/5 Nights, ₹30,678. Delhi-Agra-Jaipur-Udaipur Holiday Package From Mumbai, 7 Days/6 Nights, ₹35,922. New Delhi & Agra Vacation - From Delhi Package From ... 
Source: https://www.makemytrip.com/holidays-india/agra-packages-from-mumbai.html

2. 
Title: 10 Best Budget India Tours & Trips 2025/2026 - TourRadar
Description:  For approximately $180 per day, stay in 4-star hotels in Delhi, Jaipur, and Agra, plus 5-star luxury in Varanasi. Package includes daily breakfasts, welcome ... 
Source: https://www.tourradar.com/l/d-budget-india

3. 
Title: Golden Triangle Tour 7 Days - Delhi, Agra, Jaipur - Maharaja Trails
Description:  Experience the best of India in 7 days with our Golden Triangle Tour Package, covering Delhi, Agra, and Jaipur. Discover iconic landmarks like the Taj Mahal ... 
Source: https://www.maharajatrails.com/golden-triangle-tours/golden-triangle-tour-7-days

```yml
thoughts: >
    The initial search results provide some package tour options, but they seem to exceed the 10,000 INR budget. I need to refine my search to focus on individual travel costs and budget-friendly activities in each city. I will perform a series of more specific searches for each city to gather relevant information.
name: web_search
params: >
    {"query": "budget travel Delhi activities cost"}
```

Here is your tool response:

1. 
Title: Delhi Travel Cost - Average Price of a Vacation to Delhi
Description:  6 Apr 2025  ·  On average, budget travelers spend $20 (₨1,705) per day, mid-range travelers spend $52 (₨4,445) per day, and luxury travelers spend around $140 ... 
Source: https://www.budgetyourtrip.com/india/delhi

2. 
Title: THE 10 BEST Cheap Things to Do in New Delhi (2025) - Tripadvisor
Description:  Best Budget-Friendly Things to Do in New Delhi ; 1. Qutub Minar · 13,508 ; 2. Swaminarayan Akshardham · 12,058 ; 3. Humayun's Tomb · 10,591 ; 4. 
Source: https://www.tripadvisor.in/Attractions-g304551-Activities-zft11309-New_Delhi_National_Capital_Territory_of_Delhi.html

3. 
Title: How much should I budget for a trip to Delhi? - Quora
Description:  29 Mar 2023  ·  So, a trip to India for two people for one week costs on average ₨36,511 ($462). All of these average travel prices have been collected from ... 
Source: https://www.quora.com/How-much-should-I-budget-for-a-trip-to-Delhi

```yml
thoughts: >
    Okay, the search results indicate that a budget traveler in Delhi can expect to spend around 1705 INR per day. Cheap activities include visiting Qutub Minar, Swaminarayan Akshardham, and Humayun's Tomb. Now, I'll search for similar information for the other cities.
name: web_search
params: >
    {"query": "budget travel Agra activities cost"}
```

Here is your tool response:

1. 
Title: Agra on a Budget: Costs for Travel, Stay, and Attractions - Pathbeat
Description:  27 Jul 2024  ·  For a Couple: · Travel: ₹6,000 (train), ₹12,000 (flight). · Accommodation: ₹9,000 (mid-range hotel). · Food: ₹6,000. · Sightseeing: ₹5,000. 
Source: https://pathbeat.in/blogs/budget-friendly-agra-trip-estimating-expenses-for-travel-accommodation-dining-and-sightseeing/

2. 
Title: How Much Does a Trip to Agra Cost? Find Out Here! - Taj Mahal Cabs
Description:  13 Jun 2024  ·  The average cost of a trip to Agra for a budget traveler can range from AUD 100-200 per day. This includes transportation, accommodation, meals, and entry fees ... 
Source: https://tajmahalcabs.com/travels/how-much-does-a-trip-to-agra-cost/

3. 
Title: Agra Travel Cost - Average Price of a Vacation to Agra
Description:  2 Apr 2025  ·  Sightseeing activities, entertainment, and entrance tickets in Agra typically cost an average of $19 (₨1,644) per person, per day based on the ... 
Source: https://www.budgetyourtrip.com/india/agra

```yml
thoughts: >
    The search results suggest that sightseeing in Agra costs around 1644 INR per day. Travel and accommodation costs can be significant, but I need to find budget options. Now, I'll search for Jaipur.
name: web_search
params: >
    {"query": "budget travel Jaipur activities cost"}
```

Here is your tool response:

1. 
Title: Jaipur Trip Cost, Food, Travel, and Accommodation - Bajaj Finserv
Description:  6 Mar 2024  ·  Activities costs: Entry fees to attractions like the Amber Fort and City Palace can range from Rs. 100 to Rs. 500 per person. Guided tours and ... 
Source: https://www.bajajfinserv.in/jaipur-trip-cost

2.

Description:  3 Feb 2023  ·  Total Cost of the Trip: ; Hotels, Rs. 3,000 (for one) ; Return Transport, Rs. 1,500 ; Food, Rs. 3,000 ; Miscellaneous, Rs. 1,500 ; Total, Rs. 9,000* ...

```yml
    In Jaipur, entry fees to attractions like Amber Fort and City Palace range from 100 to 500 INR. A budget trip to Jaipur can be done under 10,000 INR, including transport, food, and accommodation. Now, I'll search for Varanasi.
name: web_search
params: >
    {"query": "budget travel Varanasi activities cost"}
```

Here is your tool response:

1.

Description:  4 Mar 2024  ·  Activities costs: Entry fees to attractions like temples and cultural shows can range from Rs. 50 to Rs. 500 per person. Boat rides on the ... 
Source: https://www.bajajfinserv.in/varanasi-trip-cost

Source: https://www.makemytrip.com/holidays-india/varanasi-travel-packages.html

3.

Description:  Best Budget-Friendly Things to Do in Varanasi · 1. Ganges River · 2. Sarnath · 3. Dasaswamedh Ghat · 4. Assi Ghat · 5. Shri Kashi Vishwanath ... 
Source: https://www.tripadvisor.in/Attractions-g297685-Activities-zft11309-Varanasi_Varanasi_District_Uttar_Pradesh.html

```yml
    In Varanasi, temple entry fees and cultural shows range from 50 to 500 INR. Budget-friendly activities include visiting the Ganges River, Sarnath, and various Ghats. Now, I'll search for Mumbai.
name: web_search
params: >
    {"query": "budget travel Mumbai activities cost"}
```

Here is your tool response:

1. 
Title: THE 10 BEST Cheap Things to Do in Mumbai (2025) - Tripadvisor
Description:  This popular tourist district includes museums, the Gateway of India, a slew of shops and vendors on the Colaba Causeway and the Sassoon Dock. 
Source: https://www.tripadvisor.in/Attractions-g304554-Activities-zft11309-Mumbai_Maharashtra.html

Description:  Visit Gateway Of India, Elephanta Caves Tour, Visit Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus, Day Out at Marine Drive, Visit Haji Ali Dargah, Explore Kanheri Caves, Enjoy ... 
Source: https://www.thrillophilia.com/things-to-do-in-mumbai

3. 
Title: Mumbai Travel Cost - Average Price of a Vacation to Mumbai
Description:  3 Apr 2025  ·  On average, budget travelers spend $31 (₨2,628) per day, mid-range travelers spend $86 (₨7,344) per day, and luxury travelers spend around $264 ... 
Source: https://www.budgetyourtrip.com/india/mumbai

```yml
    In Mumbai, budget travelers spend around 2628 INR per day. Cheap activities include visiting the Gateway of India, Marine Drive, and Haji Ali Dargah. Now, I'll search for Goa.
name: web_search
params: >
    {"query": "budget travel Goa activities cost"}
```

Here is your tool response:

1. 
Title: 20 Adventure Activities in Goa: Book Now & Get Upto 30% Off
Description:  Adventure Sports in Goa 1. Scuba Diving in Malvan 2. Sunset kayaking at Mandrem Beach 3. Flyboarding at Morjim 
Source: https://www.thrillophilia.com/adventure-activities-goa

Title: 37 Best Water Sports In Goa (2025) - @₹349 | Price List
Description:  Water sports Activities will cost you between 249 to 1599 rupees per person (as on May 2025). and if you want a combo deal of watersports activities would be ... 
Source: https://goatourspackage.com/water-sports-activities-goa/

3. 
Title: Exciting Goa Activities Under ₹1000: Budget-Friendly Fun! » Agoda
Description:  21 Mar 2025  ·  Water sports in Goa are a must-try, and you can find many options under ₹1000. For instance, parasailing typically costs around ₹800, giving you ... 
Source: https://www.agoda.com/travel-guides/india/goa/exciting-goa-activities-under-%E2%82%B91000-budget-friendly-fun/

```yml
thoughts: >
    In Goa, water sports activities can cost between 249 to 1599 INR. Parasailing is around 800 INR. Many activities are available under 1000 INR.

    Now that I have gathered information on budget travel, activities, and costs for each city, I can provide a summary of potential itineraries and cost estimates. However, planning the transportation between cities requires a different skill set. Therefore, I will delegate the task of planning transportation between cities to the Transport Coordinator.
    
    Message:
    Transport Coordinator, using the information I have gathered, please plan the transportation between Delhi, Agra, Jaipur, Varanasi, Mumbai, and Goa, considering the 10,000 INR budget. Research the most cost-effective transportation methods (trains, buses, etc.) and provide a detailed itinerary with estimated travel times and costs.

    Additional Resource:
    No additional resource
name: send_message
params: >
    {"agent_name": "Transport Coordinator",
      "message": "Transport Coordinator, using the information I have gathered, please plan the transportation between Delhi, Agra, Jaipur, Varanasi, Mumbai, and Goa, considering the 10,000 INR budget. Research the most cost-effective transportation methods (trains, buses, etc.) and provide a detailed itinerary with estimated travel times and costs.",
      "additional_resource": "No additional resource"}
```

MESSAGE FROM: Transport Coordinator
MESSAGE TO: Web Explorer

Please provide the optimal route between Delhi, Agra, Jaipur, Varanasi, Mumbai, and Goa, including the order of cities to visit to minimize travel costs and time. Also, estimate the cost of transportation between each city using trains and/or buses.

ADDITIONAL RESOURCE:
No additional resource

```yml
thoughts: >
    The Transport Coordinator needs the optimal route between the cities and estimated transportation costs. I need to determine the most logical and cost-effective order to visit these cities. Considering the geographical locations, a possible route could be: Delhi - Agra - Jaipur - Varanasi - Mumbai - Goa. I will use web search to find the approximate costs of train/bus travel between these cities.
name: web_search
params: >
    {"query": "Delhi to Agra train cost"}
```

Here is your tool response:

1.

```yml
    {"query": "Delhi to Agra train cost sleeper class"}
```

```yml
    Message:
    Transport Coordinator, here is the information you requested:

    Optimal Route: Delhi - Agra - Jaipur - Varanasi - Mumbai - Goa

    Estimated Sleeper Class Train Fares:
    *   Delhi to Agra: 200-400 INR
    *   Agra to Jaipur: 250-450 INR
    *   Jaipur to Varanasi: 400-700 INR
    *   Varanasi to Mumbai: 600-900 INR
    *   Mumbai to Goa: 300-600 INR

    Please note that these are estimates based on general knowledge and may vary. It is advisable to check actual fares and availability on railway booking websites.

    Additional Resource:
    No additional resource
name: send_message
params: >
    {"agent_name": "Transport Coordinator",
      "message": "Transport Coordinator, here is the information you requested:\n\nOptimal Route: Delhi - Agra - Jaipur - Varanasi - Mumbai - Goa\n\nEstimated Sleeper Class Train Fares:\n*   Delhi to Agra: 200-400 INR\n*   Agra to Jaipur: 250-450 INR\n*   Jaipur to Varanasi: 400-700 INR\n*   Varanasi to Mumbai: 600-900 INR\n*   Mumbai to Goa: 300-600 INR\n\nPlease note that these are estimates based on general knowledge and may vary. It is advisable to check actual fares and availability on railway booking websites.",
```
